label: ProcessCertification
comment: The process of certifying that a process has met performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements.

datatypeProperties.comment: An assertion, expressed as text, for this animal certification.
A code specifying an assertion for this specified certification, such as a claim that a product is free of hazardous chemicals.
A responsible agency, expressed as text, for this specified certification.
A standard, expressed as text, for this specified certification.

referencedBy.comment: A process certification applicable to this process certificate.
A process certification specified for this production facility.
